One of the methods the MPAA is using to fight piracy is being the first to release a pirated movie, but in TERRIBLE quality. This is designed to discourage people from even bothering to pirate. 

We saw it with Oblivion with all the watermarks in the center of the screen.

We saw it with the first release of  42 with the shaky cam.

Now we see it here.

42 has been released in certain parts of Asia as of yesterday. The MPAA knows this. So what do they do, release a BAD copy. Hundreds of thousands download the BAD copy. Soon people will not even bother downloading.
To the Korean scum who released this: Your mommas do tricks for Chinese soldiers.
